A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not perfect by any means. But I really liked this movie in its own individual place. Just not sure how well it will segue with the trilogy since I'm not really sure what they will do with the next film. \n\nBut as its own Star Wars movie\, Rian Johnson (suitably) kills it. The action and acting were on point. The Kylo and Rey fight sequence was worth the price of admission alone. Interested to see what happens next!
